text: Tatoe ichibu no kuruan ga atte, sore ni yori yamayama ga ido sa re, daichi ga saka re, matawa shisha ni katara seru koto ga dekite mo, subete no meirei wa arra ni zokusu nodearu. Arra no okokoro ga areba, jinrui o isseini michibika reru koto o, shinko suru mono-tachi wa imadani nattoku shite inai no ka. Daga fushin-sha-tachi wa kare-ra no (warui) okonai no tame ni, arra no yakusoku ga jitsugen suru made saiyaku ga kare-ra no sumai to sono fukin ni taeru koto naku tsukimato. Hontoni arra wa kesshite yakusoku o tagae rarenai
